articles.description: The potential consequences of defeat this weekend will not be lost on Nottingham Forest head coach Ange Postecoglou, with the club already looking at potential replacements.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Is the writing already on the wall for Forest boss?

articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen beats McLaren's title rivals Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri to take pole for the United States Grand Prix sprint race.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: Max Verstappen beats Lando Norris to pole for sprint race in Austin
Government 'doing everything' to overturn Maccabi Tel Aviv fan ban

articles.description: Former West Ham manager Graham Potter is in talks to become Sweden's next head coach.
articles.title: Graham Potter: Former West Ham boss in talks to take Sweden job

articles.description: European champions Paris St-Germain fight back from 3-1 down to claim a point in a thrilling 3-3 draw with Strasbourg and stay top of Ligue 1.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain 3-3 Strasbourg: PSG fight back to draw thriller and stay top of Ligue 1

articles.description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim thinks it is important Sir Jim Ratcliffe went public with his long-term thoughts - but says nothing is certain in football.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim says he can't bank on Sir Jim Ratcliffe's three-year promise

articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk is targeting a return to the ring in 2026, but has ruled out a bout with British heavyweight Moses Itauma.
articles.title: Oleksandr Usyk: Champion rules out Moses Itauma fight but planning 2026 return

articles.description: Apple wins the rights to broadcast Formula 1 in the United States for the next five years in deal said to be worth about $750m (£558m) in total.
articles.title: Formula 1: Apple wins US broadcast rights for next five years in $750m deal

articles.description: South Africa move up to second in the Women's World Cup table with a comprehensive 10-wicket win over Sri Lanka in a rain-shortened game in Colombo.
articles.title: Women's Cricket World Cup 2025: South Africa thrash Sri Lanka in rain-shortened game

articles.description: Liverpool receive a setback with their plans to sign Crystal Palace centre-back Marc Guehi on a free next summer, Manchester United eye January move for Palace midfielder Adam Wharton, while Spurs and Liverpool are keen on Bournemouth's Antoine Semenyo, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Guehi, Wharton, Branthwaite, Semenyo, Neymar, Dimarco, Lucumi, Ter Stegen, Tonali
